quiz.question: Whose birth do we celebrate on Christmas?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus came into the world to save us.

quiz.question: Who is the son of God?
quiz.additional_info: When Jesus was baptized a voice from heaven said "This is my dearly loved Son, who brings me great joy."

quiz.question: We can go to heaven when we believe in who?
quiz.additional_info: If you believe in Jesus and accept what He did for you, you will go to heaven. It's that easy!

levels.name: Level 02
levels.award_verse: ...and with your feet fitted with the readiness that comes from the gospel of peace.

quiz.question: Who was Jesus' mother?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus was born human, but He is also God!

quiz.question: Who was Mary's husband?
quiz.additional_info: An angel told Joseph to marry Mary.

quiz.question: Who baptised Jesus in the Jordan river?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus told John to baptise Him so that what God requires would be done.

levels.name: Level 03
levels.award_verse: ...with the breastplate of righteousness in place,...

quiz.question: Who did a miracle feeding 5000 people with two fish and five loaves of bread?
quiz.additional_info: God always provides!

quiz.question: Who did Jesus raise from the dead after four days?
quiz.additional_info: Because of Jesus, we will live forever with God in Heaven.

quiz.question: Who walked on water?
quiz.additional_info: All things are possible with God!

levels.name: Level 04
levels.award_verse: Stand firm then, with the belt of truth buckled around your waist,...

quiz.question: Who defeated Goliath with a sling and a stone?
quiz.additional_info: God is our strength!

quiz.question: Who spent three days in the belly of a giant fish?
quiz.additional_info: Our problems are not too big for God!

quiz.question: Who rose again after being dead for three days?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus lives!

levels.name: Level 05
levels.award_verse: ... take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.

quiz.question: Who betrayed Jesus for 30 silver coins?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus was betrayed by those He came to save.

quiz.question: Who denied he knew Jesus three times before the rooster crowed twice?
quiz.additional_info: We all make mistakes. Jesus took the punishment for those mistakes so we wouldn't have to.

quiz.question: Who told Peter "Feed my Sheep" three times?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is who makes us good.

levels.name: Level 06
levels.award_verse: ...and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

quiz.question: Who did Jesus save on the road to Damascus?
quiz.additional_info: Knowing Jesus will change your life!

quiz.question: Who was the first person to see Jesus after the resurrection?
quiz.additional_info: Those who seek God will find Him.

quiz.question: Which king of Israel does the bible say had a "heart after God"?
quiz.additional_info: We should love God with all our hearts!

levels.name: Level 07
levels.award_verse: All around him was a glowing halo...

quiz.question: Who anointed David's head with oil?
quiz.additional_info: God is for you!

quiz.question: Who received the Ten Commandments from God?
quiz.additional_info: Obeying the Ten Commandments makes our lives better. He provided them for our benefit!

quiz.question: Who ordered Jesus' crucifixion?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus went to the cross, willing to die for our sins.

levels.name: Level 08
levels.award_verse: They will soar on wings like eagles...

quiz.question: Who, in a dream, saw a stairway going from earth to heaven with angels of God ascending and descending on it?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is the only way for us to go to heaven!

quiz.question: Who died for us on a cross so we could go to Heaven?
quiz.additional_info: Thank you, Jesus!

quiz.question: Who is coming back in the future to set things right on earth?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is coming back! When that happens, every person will know He is Lord.

levels.name: Level 09
levels.award_verse: They will soar on wings like eagles...
